Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Sat 1:30-2:30 4° to 6° Full Cedar Trace and Coyote loops skating. Cedar Trace (contractors) was good and fast enough, Coyote west side plenty of snow east side sketchy but doable. Coyote loop behind Bucks had the best fast snow. 1 lap on Bucks and it was squeaky slow, classic looked fast. Fresh Toko Performance Blue ironed in and scraped and brushed well really helped.

Stoney Creek Metropark (Shelby Township).conditions: Plenty of snow in woods and on golf course, woods was nicer, less wind. Trail was soft, easy climbing but not much speed on downhills. Only classic tracks were skier produced; it would be nice if the foot traffic would stop walking in the ski tracks.

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails will be power-tilled and tracked this morning.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday thru Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 p.m.
nubsNob.comments: The cold and beautiful conditions continue at Nub's Nob. The snow surface is machine groomed with quality snow. Despite the cold temperatures the wind is light and it should make for a very nice day on the slopes. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with food service and the espresso bar. The soup of the day is beef barley. Petoskey and Harbor Springs middle schools will have a ski meet on Birch Run this afternoon. The lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
